title: Avocado, Prosciutto, and Egg Open-Faced Sandwich
directions: Heat the oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium heat. Add the eggs and cook, covered, 2 to 4 minutes for slightly runny yolks. Season with Â¼ teaspoon each salt and pepper.
Dividing evenly, top the bread with the avocado, prosciutto, and eggs.
Serve drizzled with additional oil and sprinkled with pepper
ingredients: 2tablespoons olive oil, plus more for serving
